summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Shopping List PWA. All core user flows are working excellently. Navigation fix from previous iteration was successful. The app demonstrates excellent Arabic RTL support, smooth theme/language switching, and robust offline-first functionality.
passed_tests: Welcome page loads with proper Arabic RTL layout and shopping cart icon
Navigation from Welcome to Auth page works perfectly (previous critical bug fixed)
Auth page displays with Arabic login/signup forms and local mode option
Local mode button successfully navigates to Dashboard
Dashboard loads with create list FAB and proper Arabic interface
Create list dialog opens and allows list creation
List creation completes and list appears on dashboard
Clicking list navigates to list detail page
Quick add item functionality works (added 'Apple' successfully)
Item appears in list with checkbox functionality
Item checkbox toggle works (mark as done/undone)
Back navigation from list detail to dashboard works
Theme switching works (tested dark and light themes)
No JavaScript errors or console errors during testing
